mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.*, c.*, d.*, e.*, f.order_id as diforder_id, f.order_no as diforder_no, f.order_datetime as diforder_datetime, f.order_cle_orderid as diforder_cle_orderid, f.order_cle_orderno as diforder_cle_orderno, f.order_amount as diforder_amount, f.order_statusid as diforder_statusid, g.status_id as difstatus_id, g.status_name as difstatus_name, g.status_code as difstatus_code FROM cle_order a LEFT JOIN cle_staff b ON a.order_staffid = b.staff_id LEFT JOIN sys_status c ON a.order_statusid = c.status_id LEFT JOIN cle_order_detail d ON a.order_id = d.detail_orderid LEFT JOIN cle_category e ON a.order_categoryid = e.category_id LEFT JOIN cle_dif_order f ON a.order_id = f.order_cle_orderid LEFT JOIN sys_status g ON f.order_statusid = g.status_id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.*, b.*, c.*, d.*, e.*, f.order_id as diforder_id, f.order_no as diforder_no, f.order_datetime as diforder_datetime, f.order_cle_orderid as diforder_cle_orderid, f.order_cle_orderno as diforder_cle_orderno, f.order_amount as diforder_amount, f.order_statusid as diforder_statusid, g.status_id as difstatus_id, g.status_name as difstatus_name, g.status_code as difstatus_code FROM cle_order a LEFT JOIN cle_staff b ON a.order_staffid = b.staff_id LEFT JOIN sys_status c ON a.order_statusid = c.status_id LEFT JOIN cle_order_detail d ON a.order_id = d.detail_orderid LEFT JOIN cle_category e ON a.order_categoryid = e.category_id LEFT JOIN cle_dif_order f ON a.order_id = f.order_cle_orderid LEFT JOIN sys_status g ON f.order_statusid = g.status_id WHERE a.order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select (count(1) + 1) as serial from cle_order where date_format(order_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into cle_order (order_id, order_no, order_categoryid, order_datetime, order_service_number, order_statusid, order_payableamount, order_realpayamount, order_discountamount, order_discountinfo, order_paytype, order_payid, order_userid, order_addressid, order_addressprovince, order_addresscity, order_addresscounty, order_addressstreet, order_addressconsignee, order_addressmobile, order_deleted,order_staffid) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderServiceNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderStatusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderPayableamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderRealpayamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderDiscountamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderDiscountinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderPaytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderPayid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressstreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressconsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{orderStaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update cle_order
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_categoryid = #{orderCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_datetime = #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_service_number = #{orderServiceNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_statusid = #{orderStatusid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_payableamount = #{orderPayableamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_realpayamount = #{orderRealpayamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_discountamount = #{orderDiscountamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_discountinfo = #{orderDiscountinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_paytype = #{orderPaytype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_payid = #{orderPayid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_userid = #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_addressid = #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_addressprovince = #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addresscity = #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addresscounty = #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addressstreet = #{orderAddressstreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addressconsignee = #{orderAddressconsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addressmobile = #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_deleted = #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_staffid = #{orderStaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cle_order set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_categoryid = #{orderCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_datetime = #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_service_number = #{orderServiceNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_statusid = #{orderStatusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_payableamount = #{orderPayableamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_realpayamount = #{orderRealpayamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_discountamount = #{orderDiscountamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_discountinfo = #{orderDiscountinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_paytype = #{orderPaytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_payid = #{orderPayid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_userid = #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_addressid = #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_addressprovince = #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addresscity = #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addresscounty = #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressstreet = #{orderAddressstreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressconsignee = #{orderAddressconsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressmobile = #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_deleted = #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_staffid = #{orderStaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
